Text.Page: Elesa explained all the things you can do at the beach party.

Okay...where to start?

Ah! First, you should head out in front of the tavern and meet the little popori called Langon. He can teach you all about how to build things with beach sand. He's quite the artist!

Hello? Hehe, do you see the sand castles back there? I built them myself! I can show you how to make them, too. Hehe!


Start by collecting wet sand on the beach, then do what I am doing right now. When you're done, you'll have a sand castle.
You should try it, ! Make, oh, three sand castles, and we'll see how well you do.

Hehe, have you tried it?

Fun, huh? Hehe.

But, you know, it's kind of a game for kids, like me. Wahmel has a game I want to try—but I'm too young. It's just inside the fence over there. You should give that a try!

Welcome, ! Looking for a fun game? Well, then you came to the right place.

What's the game, you ask?

It's called a "melon bash!""What's a melon bash?"

You haven't ever played a melon bash? Well, prepare to experience your new favorite sport!

All you have to do is smash three watermelons before your time runs out! Anyone can do it with one eye closed, right?

Well, what say we make it more interesting, and you wear a blindfold the whole time?

Oh, and don't listen to the watermelons. They'll try to convince you they're not watermelons, but I guarantee, they're lying!

What do you think? It's like I told you, right?

Want to go another round, or looking for a new challenge? Well, if you ask me, I suggest Chelton's splash cannons, just up the beach!

Welcome, .

This is the Splash Cannon Shooting Range! The rules are simple.

First, let me know you're interested and I'll get you set up on one of the cannon you see on the beach over there.

Then you're going to shoot monsters. Shoot! Shoot! Shoot! Red ones are worth more than blue ones!

To recap: Red, good; blue, not as good. Got it? Then let's get you started!

How was that?

Haha. Don't worry. Keep at it—you'll get the hang of it, I promise!

Want to try something new? Head over to the other side of the beach, and look for Stefanna.

Welcome. My name is Stefanna. I'm sure you've heard of me: the world-famous beautician and fashion designer? No? Well, not everyone is concerned with fashion...obviously.

So, what brings you here, then? I know that a lot of Castanics get their skin tanned around this time of year, but I don't think you need a tan, . "I'm looking for something fun to do."
Hm. Fun to do. Oh! You should go see my partner Dolme. He's a horn carver, and he is doing his own horn exhibition. You should go introduce yourself!

Greetings. You look familiar. Have we met before? Haha.
If you are looking for something that will make the beach party more fun for you, you came to the right place. To be honest with you, stuff like cannons, watermelons, and sand castles are just about making money from the tourists. "So what do you do at the festival?"

I'm a traditionalist: I grind horns. It's only the most important part of the beach party. In fact, <PCNAME>, let me make you something awesome, by way of a demonstration. The first thing we'll need are some useful horns. Why don't you bring a molar of a warthog?

Ooh, an excellent specimen!

Now please just wait here a little bit while I make something for you. "Okay. I can't wait to see it!"

...and finished!

Doesn't it look great? Well, I don't know what you expected from a little warthog tooth.

Oh, well, it's not a complete loss. Take it to Ramsay at the Tear of the Viper—the tavern on the beach—and he'll give you a free drink for it!
Go get a horn and I will make you something great.

Ah! So cute! This is for me?

Wow, it's made so well! And you want me to have it? Thank you!

Here: a gift for you. It's the least I could do. And any time you want another, just bring me another one of these great horn carvings.

Enjoy the festival!
